mapper.select:
SELECT id id, limit_buy_act_id limitBuyActId, limit_goods_sku_id limitGoodsSkuId, user_id userId, buy_no buyNo, created_time createdTime, updated_time updatedTime FROM t_esp_limit_buy_act WHERE 1=1
AND limit_buy_act_id = #{limitBuyActId} AND limit_goods_sku_id = #{limitGoodsSkuId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_time desc
